about.title: About me
about.text1: Hello! I am an English-Brazilian Portuguese translator with a strong affinity for languages since childhood. Over the years, I have developed skills that have allowed me to achieve proficiency in English, including reading, writing, and comprehending texts. I have been writing articles in Portuguese and English and translating websites, which have helped me enhance my translation abilities.
about.text2: Furthermore, my background as a programmer enables me to accurately understand and translate technical materials such as manuals, user guides, and API documentation. I am also capable of adapting websites to provide a comprehensive experience for Brazilian users.
